mapper.select: SELECT * from( SELECT rownum cnt, a.rtQNA_CODE, a.rtqna_detail, a.mem_name, a.rtqna_state, a.mem_code from( SELECT a.*, b.rtqna_detail, c.mem_name FROM rtqna a, (SELECT a.* FROM rtqna_detail a, (SELECT max(rtqna_detail_code) lastqna FROM rtqna_detail GROUP by rtqna_code) b where b.lastqna = a.rtqna_detail_code) b, MEMBER c WHERE a.rtqna_code = b.rtqna_code AND a.mem_code = c.mem_code ORDER BY rtqna_state) a) WHERE cnt BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT a.mem_code, a.RTQNA_STATE, b.RTQNA_TIME , b.RTQNA_WRITER , b.RTQNA_DETAIL ,c."name" FROM rtqna a, rtqna_detail b, (SELECT mem_code "code", mem_name "name" FROM MEMBER UNION SELECT admin_code, admin_name FROM ADMIN) c WHERE a.rtqna_code = b.RTQNA_CODE and b.RTQNA_WRITER = c."code" AND a.MEM_CODE = #{mem_code} ORDER BY rtqna_time
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET noti_title = #{noti_title}, noti_detail = #{noti_detail}, noti_upt_date = CURRENT_DATE, noti_ck = #{noti_ck}, admin_code = #{admin_code} WHERE noti_code = #{noti_code}
